detail_desc: Comb for wool and cashmere that removes bobbles and helps to prolong the life of garments. To use, place the garment on a solid surface and comb carefully.
Dress in a patterned viscose weave with buttons at the top and a lace yoke at the front. Gathered seam at the top and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Blouse in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Sewn-in pin-tucks at the top, a smocked section at the back and long, wide sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons.
Tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt, and a rounded hem.
Tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt, and a rounded hem.
Short, sleeveless, one-shoulder dress in pleated chiffon. One shoulder strap with faceted plastic stones,a concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist. Jersey lining.

5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Slightly wider, straight-cut T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with decorative stitching around the sleeves and hem.
Round earrings in metal with circular pendants. The earrings are decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length approx. 7 cm.

Long-sleeved romper suits in soft jersey with press-studs down the front and at the crotch, and feet with elastication at the heels. Size 0-2M have cuffs that can be folded over to keep the hands warm. The romper suits are made partly from organic cotton.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves, narrow cuffs with ties, and a narrow elasticated seam under the bust.
Large scarf in a soft, airy weave with fringes on the short sides.
Large scarf in a soft, airy weave with fringes on the short sides.
Block-coloured jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft, ribbed jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and short slits at the hems.

Short gilet with a quilted, lightly padded front, small ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Front pockets with a concealed zip and a jersey back with a brushed, thermal inside. Wide ribbing around the armholes and hem. Lined front.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim made from a cotton blend with a regular, adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim made from a cotton blend with a regular, adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim made from a cotton blend with a regular, adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Leggings in stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Leggings in stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short swim shorts in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet side pockets. Soft mesh inner shorts. One pair is patterned.
Long cardigan in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Long cardigan in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Knee-length coat in soft felted fabric with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams and a straight-cut hem. Lined.
Knee-length coat in soft felted fabric with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams and a straight-cut hem. Lined.
Boxy-style top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back, a high waist with pleats and a narrow tie belt, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back, a high waist with pleats and a narrow tie belt, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Leather Derby shoes with angular toes and open lacing. Leather linings and insoles and welt-stitched rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Short, sleeveless top in ribbed jersey, designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Lined bikini top with a wrapover front and back, wide elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Lined bikini top with a wrapover front and back, wide elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Leather boots with a straight shaft and twill linings and insoles. Heel 3.5 cm.

Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems. Front pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and decorative pocket flaps at the back.

Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems. Front pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and decorative pocket flaps at the back.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, covered heels and a concealed zip in one side. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Fully lined swimsuit in a narrow cut at the top with a metal fastener at the back of the neck. Wrapover front with a cut-out section, an open section at the back, seam at the waist and high-cut legs.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey, two with flounces across the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey, two with flounces across the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Brogue-patterned boots in imitation leather with checked, felted sections. Padded top edge, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip at one side. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Joggers in soft, washed cotton denim. Loose fit with a ribbed, drawstring waist, fake front pockets and gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft, washed cotton denim. Loose fit with a ribbed, drawstring waist, fake front pockets and gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Boots with an ankle-height shaft, zip in one side, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Top in soft cotton denim with a wide, elasticated neckline, flutter sleeves with broderie anglaise and scalloped edges, and a straight-cut hem.

Dog bed with sturdy woven fabric on the outside and soft faux fur on the inside. Firmly stuffed to keep its shape. Small imitation leather appliqué on the front and anti-slip protectors underneath. Size approx. 34x44 cm.
Sandals with square toes, narrow straps and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Sandals with square toes, narrow straps and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.

Fancy dress gloves in printed jersey with padded uppers and narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Joggers in lightweight cotton denim. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim and detachable tie belt, front pockets and gently tapered legs.
Chunky-soled sandals with adjustable fabric straps and hook and loop fastenings. Imitation leather insoles. Height of soles 7 cm.
Strappy top and a pair of shorts in waffled jersey. Top with narrow shoulder straps and an overlocked hem. Shorts with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and overlocked edges at the waist and hems.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey with a lightly brushed finish. Straight-cut top with long, wide raglan sleeves. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Trousers in jersey containing shimmering metallic threads. High waist with covered elastication, and wide, flared hems.
Straight-cut blouse in lace with a small stand-up collar, press-studs at the back of the neck, long, slightly wider sleeves and cuffs with press-studs.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in organic cotton jersey. Hoodie with a kangaroo pockets a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in organic cotton jersey. Hoodie with a kangaroo pockets a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Dog jumper in a soft, patterned knit with a polo neck, ribbing around the front legs and an opening for the back legs.

Shirt in an airy linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in an airy linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Wide, gently draping trousers in a soft, fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Regular, elasticated waist.
Lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups and a metal fastener at the back. Silicone trim at the top, side support and visible seams and gathers for a pleated effect.
Leather ankle boots with scuba fabric inserts and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 6 cm.

Suede ankle boots with open toes and covered block heels. Adjustable tab and metal buckle, a zip on the inside and an open section on the outside of the shaft. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
